title: David’s Song of Praise
summary: David praises God for delivering him from all his enemies. This poetic chapter mirrors Psalm 18 and celebrates God’s strength, justice, and faithfulness throughout David’s life.

faq.question: What themes are in David’s song?
faq.answer: God’s deliverance, protection, power, and faithfulness to the righteous.

faq.question: What does David call God in this chapter?
faq.answer: His rock, fortress, deliverer, and shield.
